Name: Bomber
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer, stir and serve with straws.
Review: A cross between a Moscow Mule and a Cuba Libre .
History: Created in 1998 by the B. Bar crew at The Reading Festival, England
Nutrition: One serving of Bomber contains 172 calories
